PutFile access token used: User A, since User B is not editing.
Additional notes: After no more than 5 minutes, Office Online will call CheckFileInfo with User B's access token. That call will indicate that User B no longer has edit permissions, so User B will be kicked out of the editing session. User A can continue editing the document.

After no more than 15 minutes, Excel Online will call RefreshLock with User B's access token. That call will fail since User B no longer has edit permissions, so User B will be kicked out of the editing session. User A can continue editing the document.
